channel.title: Changing the way of building web apps!
channel.description:
Hey bootstrappers,
As some of you might know we've been working on Scalab for a while already and I'm very excited to share these updates:
We decided to change the name to [funkLang](https://www.funklang.com/). funkLang it's a new FrontEnd framework that combines visual and programmatic workflows that allow designers and developers to work together; think about a mix of Figma, React, and Webflow.
We started to send the [beta](https://www.funklang.com/betaSignup) invites last month, and we are planning to officially launch in January. Please drop your feedback, opinion, doubts, or any comment here or to andres@funklang.com.
![hero|473x500, 50%](upload://onvwEbh9wAvBC4CjxHhXOLQ52C1.gif)

item.title: Changing the way of building web apps!
item.dc:creator: andressb
item.description:
Hey @unboot
We are doing a soft launch tomorrow, and if everything goes smoothly next week we will be doing the full launch.
We will be doing a Live, if you are interested I’ll keep you posted.

Read full topic
